types.html:
ô

  1. O (vocative)
    Ô mon Dieu!
    Oh my God!
    Ô Canada
    O Canada
    • 2017, Pomme, Pauline:
      Ô Pauline, pendus à tes bottines, les garçons passaient tous à côté de moi.
      Oh Pauline, the boys were all hung up on your ankle boots, and they took no notice of me.

title: ô
